class pepper.framework.infra.event.api.EventBus[source]¶

Bases: object

Supports publishing of and subscribing to events based on topics.

Events published to a topic are delivered to all subscribers in the order of their arrival. Publishing and invocation of the subscribed handler can be asynchronous. Subscribers receive only events that arrive after they subscribed to a topic.
